title: Filter Practice
description: I created this project to practice filtering through products using hooks. This project only filters through products - the images do not lead to another page.

title: Bitcoin News Feed
description: Built bitcoin news feed, accessing News API with Axios, built out resusable components in React.js, and made responsive with CSS Flexbox.

title: Space Net Website
description: Built with React.js, Bootstrap4, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I made this site as practice in developing a React.js website.

title: Personal Website V2
description: Built from scratch with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, no frameworks used.

title: Pixel Perfect for ClickUp
description: Mini pixel perfect project built for ClickUp, using BEM, SASS, and Glup.
